Windows 11 23H2 更新将于今年秋季推出，以下是新内容https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/microsoft/windows-11-23h2-update-coming-this-fall-heres-whats-new/ Sun, 23 Jul 2023 17:12:41 -0400玛雅克·帕尔玛MicrosoftSoftware https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/microsoft/windows-11-23h2-update-coming-this-fall-heres-whats-new/ As Microsoft prepares for the imminent rollout of Windows 11 23H2, they've been developing various innovative features designed to improve user experience, streamline workflows, and introduce next-generation functionalities. This article will explore new features, from dynamic lighting to Windows Copilot upgrades. [...]
